function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ieq sensor nodes connected to the internet potentially vulnerable to cyberattacks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cloud services accessed from anywhere in the internet increase risk of data breaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide distribution of smart ieq sensor nodes increases risk of spreading contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high occupancy in the faculty building","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the staff office","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene practices in the laboratory and classroom","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in co2 concentration depending on sensor location","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation during door and window opening","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq monitoring system testing without considering infectious disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation due to open windows","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in temperature conditions in the laboratory depending on location","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intermittent loss of wifi communication in the laboratory","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous increase in eco2 values despite open windows","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Calibration errors due to imprecise sensor","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High eco2 levels in indoor environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality monitoring leading to potential spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security risks related to sensor communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infectious sars-cov-2 virus spreading between people in close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 leading to significant confirmed cases and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in complying with social distancing and capacity limitations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased gatherings in leisure areas and markets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowds and hotspots in urban areas increasing the likelihood of contagion","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups in high-risk areas near schools and nursing homes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of risk areas in the city related to contagion propagation.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of the danger model to accurately capture the usual functioning of the city and the routines of its citizens.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of areas with the highest risk of contagion based on the occupancy model and knowledge base","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction of safe pedestrian routes in a covid-19 pandemic context","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the proposed service for purposes other than covid-19 safety, such as avoiding sunny areas in summer or closed streets due to events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for pandemic containment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on specific technological solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unintended consequences of technology integration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate crisis management and response to disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring devices that track contact with infected people may raise privacy concerns and result in of citizens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard message libraries for pandemic communication may lack cultural sensitivity and relevance to specific populations, leading
